favourite.article: Praise the Lord that I can come out of all my negative situations and just flee to Him and enjoy all that He is! Jesus, I come to Thee!
I learned this wonderful song for the first time at the Highschoolers' Training and I enjoyed it so much. Jesus, I come to Thee!
Praise God we can leave all that we are and just be in God's wonderful presence!
Praise the Lord!!! How wonderful to have Jesus to flee to! He accepts us, loves us, and heals us :)
I'm hearing this version for the first time and I looove it!
i love this gospel hymn because I am reminded back to the basic. No matter what the situation is, I just need to come back to Him. OUT OF and INTO JESUS! The gospel is a Wonderful Person.
This song lets you know you always have a refuge, in any given situation He shall always be your peace.
This song was my favourite song because it reminded of the singing at the meetings before I left.
"HALLELUJAH SAINTS! Praise the Lord that today, Christ as the Person of jubilee has released us from every bondage of sin, Satan and the world. What we need today is to enjoy all His riches!
We sang this song one day and we loved it so much!!!!!!!!
